name: onbouge
description: Application web pour connecter les sportifs (anciennement Rally Point)

scripts.update: docker compose down && git pull && docker compose up -d
scripts.commit: git add . && git commit -m "update" && git push
scripts.restart: npm run stop && npm run start
scripts.clean: docker compose down -v --remove-orphans && sudo rm -rf data_mysql data_portainer data_caddy data_strapi
